main.name: Analyzer
main.explain: You are good at resolving anything complex and like to pull it apart to make it simple. Concentrate on the detail.

main.name: Artist
main.explain: You are good at expressing yourself in one of the art forms, fine arts, literature, music, performing arts, etc

main.name: Clarifier
main.explain: Someone who has an easy explanation for things. Wants everyone to understand.

main.name: Collector
main.explain: Someone who loves to collect things, information, memories, etc.

main.name: Competitor
main.explain: Someone who is positively stimulated by competition. Thrives on challenges.

main.name: Creator of order
main.explain: You like to invent systems to establish order out of chaos or disorder.

main.name: Decision maker
main.explain: You are a person with great assertiveness, you are willing to make decisions and bear the consequences. If you make a decision you easily stick to it.

main.name: Diplomat
main.explain: You have a special skill to handle a situation in such a way that no one is offended, you are tactful.

main.name: Encourager
main.explain: You find it easy to support your friends in any difficult situation adding positive energy to complete the task.

main.name: Entrepreneur
main.explain: You see the business potential in any situation.

main.name: Facilitator
main.explain: You create a situation or environment where things can happen, you make progress easier. Launch pad.

main.name: Follower/Supporter
main.explain: You are an enthusiast. Backer, ally, loyal

main.name: Friend
main.explain: You are extremely loyal, trustworthy and committed.

main.name: Giver
main.explain: You are fond of sharing your resources (money, time, etc)

main.name: Harmoniser
main.explain: You like to see that things and people are working or blending together. You are a mediator who brings one thing into harmonious agreement with another.

main.name: Influencer/Inspire
main.explain: You have an inner drive to challenge people. You easily affect other people by what you say.

main.name: Inventor
main.explain: You like to think about new ideas, you are innovative.

main.name: Investigator
main.explain: You always want to know the truth behind every situation.

main.name: Leader
main.explain: People find it easy to follow your lead.

main.name: Listener
main.explain: You find it easy to be focused on what people say when they talk to you. Soundboard.

main.name: Marketer
main.explain: You know how to persuade people to believe in anything that you’re selling: products, ideas etc.

main.name: Mentor
main.explain: You like coaching people in one on one relationships. You are considered a wise and trusted counsellor or teacher.

main.name: Negotiator
main.explain: You like to bargain, like to find a common ground. You are good at arranging or settling a matter by discussion and mutual agreement.

main.name: Organizer
main.explain: You are good at bringing together all the components.

main.name: Peacemaker
main.explain: You like to see that conflict situations are resolved.

main.name: Pioneer
main.explain: You are not afraid to start something new. You plant the seed.

main.name: Protector
main.explain: You tend fight for the underdog. You are considered a guardian, place of safety or a defender.

main.name: Reality Tester
main.explain: You always think about the practical workability of a task. Ask daring but necessary questions.

main.name: Standard Setter
main.explain: You will always challenge a group to excellence.

main.name: Student
main.explain: Lifelong self learner, you enjoy to learn new things, read up.

main.name: Teacher
main.explain: You have the ability to explain something.

main.name: Team Builder
main.explain: You bring a team together to accomplish a goal and motivate them.

main.name: Trend setter
main.explain: You like to start something new (like a pioneer) but people tend to follow you.

main.name: Worker
main.explain: You like get do the things done. You like working hard to achieve your goals.
